attributes.action: Prince Harry & Meghan Markle's Royal Wedding in 2018 should be a Public Holiday
attributes.additional_details: This would also have a knock on effect in terms of tourism, spending and community spirit, much in the way of past nationwide events.
attributes.background: In this countrywide time of uncertainty and low morale, a shared celebration of national unity and ethnic diversity, championed at the highest level of the status quo, is the ideal method of displaying Britain is moving forward, despite Brexit and the growth of the far right message.
